column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My friend and I stopped in for dinner on Halloween night
column2: and the place was energetic but not packed. Good service
column3: nice ambiance. We ordered the roast dates
column8: all good but not amazing...though now that I think about it
column9: we weren't too creative with our ordering. If I came back
column10: I might branch out a little more and then perhaps I'd be a bit more impressed.
